author: arunhep
body:
GT updates to fix the CTPPS reco geometry.
The request is made here : 
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3533.html

and corresponding PR from CTPPS is here : https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/22547

difference of GTs : 

- 2018_MC

https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/101X_upgrade2018_design_v7/101X_upgrade2018_design_v6
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/101X_upgrade2018_realistic_v6/101X_upgrade2018_realistic_v5
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/101X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v7/101X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v6

- Upgrade : 

https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/101X_postLS2_design_v4/101X_postLS2_design_v3
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/101X_postLS2_realistic_v4/101X_postLS2_realistic_v3
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/101X_upgrade2023_realistic_v4/101X_upgrade2023_realistic_v3
title: GT Updates : CTPPS Geometry update
